archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0717
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to implement a set of rules for when a customer is eligible to apply for a device on interest free, so that I can reduce bad debt

properties.value: What kind of rules? DX Diane: Product eligibility rules for eg; Interest free payments available only on PS5 gaming console devices. There may also be rules restricting eligibilty based on - current payment/arrears - credit history information - on fraud black list - # of IF they have currently - history of bad debt/payment history with Voda Such checks can be done prior to an IFP offer going out or when a customer initiates an IFP order.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
